Okay so if you think when you're reading this that Team Fortress 2 is "good", then you may as well quit while you're ahead, because you couldn't be anymore wrong, now being 2019 and getting close to the next year i just figured out that TF2 havn't had any new update for almost a full year now, and i think it's because all the players have destroyed it 100%, i mean it used to be the top 3 most played game on steam but now... now it's just 7th place in the top 10 list and that's really sad, TF2 have had some amazing updates and have seen the glory days and proven that it has what it takes to be the best, but every player ruin it, if you still don't know what i'm talking about or that i'm just talking shit and you think i don't know any better and start just looking at my profile, then fucking don't, i've played TF2 since 2012 when it was in it's prime, but now i don't want to see it anymore but valve ofcorse don't let anyone remove it and you want more proof that you people destroy this game then just listen up because if you don't see what i see then TF2 won't last in 2020.

First off, the 9 characters have been all we ever have had for over 12 years now or longer at this point and we havn't gotten anything new, it's like valve don't bother to get an idea saying "hey maybe we can give them a new class to play to help make matches not the same all the time", trust me the classes i see more then anyone in any server are these ones.
Soldier
Spy
Pyro
Heavy + Medic combo
and i barely see anything else besides that.

second point, all those cool weapons that every class has that are supposed to mix the gameplay up and be super cool to use and give players a new type of gameplay feel, everyone just use their primary weapons only, like if you play then just look at the kill feed and tell me how many people die to primary weapons, also to let you guys know before you start talking shit about it,. spy's primary is not the revolver, it's his knife because everyone uses it more then the revolver, medic's primary is his medigun, and engi's primary is none of his guns, it's his sentry, everyone just uses primary weapons and don't give me the crap saying things like "i use the flaregun for pyro from time to time or i use the jarate with the bushwaker (or whatever it's called)" don't give me that crap, reason why is because those are combo weapons, weapons you can use to combo with other weapons and they don't count at all, flaregun for pyro crits on burning targets so ofcorse you will first set them on fire and then airblast them into the air and then shoot the flaregun at them for an easy kill, that's a combo move and it's just another excuse of trying to use your secondary more, but have you ever played with just the secondary weapons and melee only, not using your primary, no because you're just glued to the damn thing.

and the third point that i want to put on here is that you only use the most op weapons and barely any other weapons you ever use anymore, like just a few as an example.
scattergun
direct hit
black box
rocket launcher
flamethrower
backburner
phlog
tomislav
minigun
and the list goes on.
There are only a few selected weapons you use and everything else never get's used at all, because the few i mentioned are the "best" ones to use, and you don't use anything else and you don't try anything else.

So if you think that TF2 still is good, and that you think they will get better in the next update, then ask yourself this, if valve wanted to make it better then why havn't there been any new update for almost a full year, there has not been a new update since the jungle inferno update and no one seems to mind it, so valve has gone and been working on new things leaving TF2 in the trash, if you want to make it better then i suggest that you start using your secondary's and melee weapons more and not just have your primary weapons out like a baby you can't let go off.

TF2 also havn't had any new weapons added since the pyro update either, only skins and nothing else, if it continues like this then i will bet that TF2 won't be on the top 10 most played game on steam list for much longer.

TF2 get's a 1/10 the worst game on the planet and it won't go higher unless valve give an update to bring it to the glory days and that players start actually using other weapons other then primary only.

In a land a long, long time ago, Team Fortress 2 would be a critically acclaimed first person shooter. Boasting its colorful characters against the dreary palette of the Badlands, this game offered to many a wonderful experience. Later updates would add cosmetics, weapons, and a ton of other things to sink your teeth into. Some of those updates are not as well viewed by the community as others, like the addition of crazier and crazier hats. In recent years, the community has felt somewhat negatively towards the team of developers and their updates for this game. Though, there is something important to remember.

We first saw those deranged mercenaries nearly ten years ago! This game has been alive and kicking for a long time, and I doubt that you will soon see a day where these nine mercs aren't defying laws of physics, common sense, and sometimes all laws in general. You won't find many other games with a soviet in love with a 300 pound minigun who he just lugs around like it's nothing. Nor will you find a quick-witted, caffeine-fueled Bostonian who dances around the battlefield, dodging rockets and bullets like a madman. This game is very outlandish, and incredibly enjoyable. Even after years and years of pushing a payload down a track to blow up the enemies... people want to come back, because although there's some basis and objectives for the game modes, you never play the same game twice. Every match is a total surprise. Even competitively, the 9 classes and variety in what you can play with, it will give you a new experience almost every time you play.

Years of pushing a cart filled to the brim with explosives is a hard task. Thankfully, there are new faces, hats to wear, weapons to try, and a new experience to be had every single day.

Well, since I got a fair bit of playtime on this game, I think it would be time to write a real review. (Never wrote reviews before, so I'll just do some pros and cons and then my opinion).

I think there is a lot of positives and negatives, so here are some of them!

[b]Pros[/b]
-TF2 is for me a game of unlimited fun. I'm over 4000 hours now, and still find it just as enjoyable as first time I started up the game.
-It's a good first person shooter for players who don't have a lot of experience with first person shooters. But it's also challenging for experienced gamers, because there is a lot of difrent classes, and even more difrent playstyles. 
-It's friendly for all ages. It's easy to pick up for smaller kids, but also holds an interest for ''older'' players.
-Like in CS:GO there are also community servers, which bring even more playmodes, mods and almost difrent games to the table.


[b]Cons[/b]
-The matchmaking is still not working 100% correctly. You still sometimes get in a game where it's 5 vs 10. And sometimes everybody from one team leaves, and it takes up to hours for new players to join, so in the meantime it's a really unbalanced match. 
-The updates are still dissapointing to me. When they come out, they are extremly poorly done, and it takes many months for the updates to get to a decent completion. Example; Meet your Match came out many months ago (I don't remember the exact date), and it has just recently in my opinion, gotten to a decent state.


This game means so much to me, I've spend so so many hours in it, and none of them has been boring.
I can only recommend this game!
